abstract: Households underreport the magnitude of their credit card debts by at least one-third, according to a New York Fed study.
snippet: Households underreport the magnitude of their credit card debts by at least one-third, according to a New York Fed study.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York

lead_paragraph: It would appear that Americans don't even know how much they owe.

headline.main: How Much Do You Owe? Guess Again
